players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I am not the mafia, I believe we should focus on finding the real culprit and work together as a team."
Charlie: " I'm concerned about Bob's death and think we should investigate Diana first to see if she has any information about the mafia."
You: "I have an alibi for the night of Bob's death, I was at home with my family. Let's focus on finding the real killer and not make baseless accusations."
Charlie: "Let's investigate Diana first, she was the last one to see Bob alive and hasn't said anything about what happened. We can't just ignore her suspicious behavior."
